headline.main: Martin O’Malley Says Immigration Reform Would Be a Priority in His White House

docs.snippet: Mr. O’Malley, a former governor of Maryland, told the United States Hispanic Chamber of Commerce that he would tackle the issue within the first 100 days of his administration....
docs.abstract: Mr. O’Malley, a former governor of Maryland, told the United States Hispanic Chamber of Commerce that he would tackle the issue within the first 100 days of his administration.

headline.main: Widow of Man Run Over by Suge Knight Sues for Wrongful Death
headline.print_headline: Widow of Man Run Over by Suge Knight Sues for Wrongful Death

docs.snippet: The widow of a man who died when he was run over by a pickup truck driven by Marion "Suge" Knight filed a wrongful death lawsuit Wednesday against the former rap music mogul and key figures involved in the upcoming film "Straight Outta Compton."...
docs.lead_paragraph: The widow of a man who died when he was run over by a pickup truck driven by Marion "Suge" Knight filed a wrongful death lawsuit Wednesday against the former rap music mogul and key figures involved in the upcoming film "Straight Outta Compton."

headline.main: US Tells Okinawa Governor That New Airfield Is Only Solution
headline.print_headline: US Tells Okinawa Governor That New Airfield Is Only Solution

docs.snippet: U.S. officials in Washington told the visiting governor of Okinawa that there is no alternative but to build an airfield for the Marines on his southern Japanese island....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. officials in Washington told the visiting governor of Okinawa that there is no alternative but to build an airfield for the Marines on his southern Japanese island.

docs.snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio looked on as relatives of Michael Demeo, a medal recipient, shared a moment of joy on Wednesday at the 146th annual Medal Day ceremony for New York firefighters at City Hall Plaza in Manhattan....

headline.main: Buehrle Dominates Nationals; Blue Jays Win 8-0
headline.print_headline: Buehrle Dominates Nationals; Blue Jays Win 8-0

docs.snippet: Mark Buehrle threw a six-hitter — his 11th career shutout — and the Toronto Blue Jays scored four runs in the first inning to close the interleague series against the Washington Nationals with an 8-0 victory Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mark Buehrle threw a six-hitter — his 11th career shutout — and the Toronto Blue Jays scored four runs in the first inning to close the interleague series against the Washington Nationals with an 8-0 victory Wednesday night.

headline.main: Southwest Airlines Says Sale Response Overwhelmed System
headline.print_headline: Southwest Airlines Says Sale Response Overwhelmed System

headline.main: Former FIFA VP Warner Makes Televised Address in Trinidad
headline.print_headline: Former FIFA VP Warner Makes Televised Address in Trinidad

docs.snippet: Former FIFA vice president Jack Warner made a televised address in Trinidad on Wednesday night, saying he will prove a link between soccer's governing body and his nation's elections in 2010....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former FIFA vice president Jack Warner made a televised address in Trinidad on Wednesday night, saying he will prove a link between soccer's governing body and his nation's elections in 2010.
